lead_paragraph: Pirelli will host a meeting of Formula One's key stakeholders in Milan next week to discuss how the sport wants the tyres to perform in future.

headline.print_headline: Pirelli to Host 'Vital' Meeting on F1 Tyres
headline.main: Pirelli to Host 'Vital' Meeting on F1 Tyres

snippet: Pirelli will host a meeting of Formula One's key stakeholders in Milan next week to discuss how the sport wants the tyres to perform in future....
